title: Rotation - Find force for rotational equilibrium

content.prompt: At which of the labeled positions must an upward force of magnitude 2F be exerted on the meterstick to keep the meterstick in rotational equilibrium?

topic.text: 5.5: Rotational Equilibrium and Newton's First Law in Rotational Form

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
